message: Last week I spotted this post http://sqlmag.com/blog/should-i-be-using-san-snapshots-backup-solution on sqlmag.com, the article is full of wrong information and ingnorance, I was honored to team up with my fellow MVP Mark Arnold to respond to it, please read our response below, please don't make it stop here and spread the knowledge.
